und.value:
This view of our Siding Spring node in New South Wales, Australia shows the clamshell enclosure of th 2-meter Faulkes Telescope South and 2 x 1-meter telescope enclosures. When this picture was taken the 1-meter domes were awaiting the arrival of their telescopes.

The rural landscape highlights why Siding Spring is a great site for professional level astronomical observing.

Image credit: John Shobbrook, FTS observatory manager.
und.safe_value:
This view of our Siding Spring node in New South Wales, Australia shows the clamshell enclosure of th 2-meter Faulkes Telescope South and 2 x 1-meter telescope enclosures. When this picture was taken the 1-meter domes were awaiting the arrival of their telescopes.

The rural landscape highlights why Siding Spring is a great site for professional level astronomical observing.
